Key:
Hm. I wanted to go on a date with Kotori, but
I think she might be on the Fraxinus.
Oh well. I guess I'll hit the market.

Hm. Instead of thinking about who to date,
here I am at the station...
Oh, well. I've got to get groceries anyway.

Now, that should cover everything for dinner.
Hm, is that...?
Kotori...?
Oh, Shido?
What are you doing here?
I... was looking up at the sky.
The sky?

Yes. Staring as the clouds go by. It puts my
mind at ease.

I see. Seems like... being Ratatoskr's commander
is tough work.
Yes, but I can't run away from it.
Kotori...
Shin, are you with Kotori?
Reine-san? Yes, I'm with her now.
Oh, I see. Glad to hear it. There's an error in\nthe system, and I can't seem to spot her.
She seems... stressed out.
Hm. I knew it. She's becoming emotionally\nunstable.

Yeah. Despite her wearing her black ribbons,
she's awfully quiet.
Shin... Cheer up Kotori.
What, me?
There's a lot on her shoulders. It's important\nto show appreciation when you can.
We're trying our best to care for her, but what\neases her mind most are your words, Shin.
Yeah, but... I don't know what to say.
It's all right. Don't think too hard about it.\nJust be yourself.
Okay. I'll try my best.
Yes. That's the spirit.
U-Uh...
Be positive.
Care for her.
Um. That's not like you, Kotori.
Huh...?

Are you feeling sentimental because you're
tired? Knowing your usual self, you usually
play it off like it's nothing, right?
Wh-What...?

It's fine. Kotori, you're doing a great job. Even
now, I know you'll make it through. When it's
all over, you'll be able to relax.
Hmph. Got me there, Shido.
Uh...

You don't need to tell me that! Don't worry
about me. I'll be my usual self in no time!
Hahaha! Exactly. That's the Kotori I know.
Oh, geez... Well.
I'm going to return to the Fraxinus!
Amazing, Shin. Kotori already sounds better.
I hope so. I just don't want her to overdo it.
Kotori, hang in there.

Kotori, don't push yourself too hard. Things
won't end well if you pass out, so get some
rest.

If I could rest, then I would have done so!
I'm sighing because I can't.
...Oh, okay.

Jeez. You're always meddling with my
business.
S-Sorry.
I'm going home.
I wonder if I screwed up.
Shin, women are complex creatures.
Well, uh... *sigh*.
